TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuntimeEnvironment extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a collection of methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.

remarks.format:
## Examples This example shows how to call many of the methods defined by the RuntimeEnvironment class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool FromGlobalAccessCache(class System.Reflection.Assembly a) cil managed

Docs.summary: Tests whether the specified assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache.
Docs.returns: if the assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetRuntimeDirectory() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the directory where the common language runtime is installed.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the path to the directory where the common language runtime is installed.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates calling the GetRuntimeDirectory method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment> class.
[!code-cs[RuntimeEnvironment#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.runtime.interop_27_1.cs)] [!code-vb[RuntimeEnvironment#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.runtime.interop_27_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[RuntimeEnvironment#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.runtime.interop_27_1.cpp)]

Docs.permission: for accessing files and folders. Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public static IntPtr GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr (Guid clsid, Guid riid);
.method public static hidebysig native int GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr(valuetype System.Guid clsid, valuetype System.Guid riid) cil managed

Docs.param: The identifier for the desired class.
The identifier for the desired interface.
Docs.summary: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.
Docs.returns: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime.
The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`.
|`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongName|
GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A> method.

Docs.permission: requires full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject (Guid clsid, Guid riid);
.method public static hidebysig object GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject(valuetype System.Guid clsid, valuetype System.Guid riid) cil managed

Docs.param: The identifier for the desired class.
The identifier for the desired interface.
Docs.summary: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its interface.
Docs.returns: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> method.

Docs.permission: requires full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string GetSystemVersion() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the version number of the common language runtime that is running the current process.
Docs.returns: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.

remarks.format:

Docs.value: The path to the system configuration file.
